30 double MotorCurrent::calculateCurrent(const double fullLoadAmps) {
31  EstimateFLA estimateFLA(motorRatedPower, motorRPM, lineFrequency, efficiencyClass, specifiedEfficiency,
32  ratedVoltage);
33  std::array<double, 6> plValues = estimateFLA.calculate();
34  estimatedFLA = estimateFLA.getEstimatedFLA();
35 
36  // Adjustment based on the rated voltage and Adjustment based on the specified FLA
37  for (auto & val : plValues) {
38  val *= 460 / ratedVoltage;
39 // val *= fullLoadAmps / tempFLA;
40  }
41  auto const tempFLA = plValues[4];
42  for (auto & val : plValues) {
43  val *= fullLoadAmps / tempFLA;
44  }
45 
46 
47  if (loadFactor < 0.251) {
48  return CurveFitVal({0, 0.25, 0.5}, {plValues[0], plValues[1], plValues[2]}, 2, loadFactor).calculate();
49  } else if (loadFactor < 1.251) {
50  CurveFitVal cfv({0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1, 1.25}, {plValues[1], plValues[2], plValues[3], plValues[4], plValues[5]}, 4, loadFactor);
51  return cfv.calculate();
52  }
53  if (loadFactor > 1.5) {
54  loadFactor = 1.5;
55  }
56  return CurveFitVal({.75, 1.00, 1.25}, {plValues[3], plValues[4], plValues[5]}, 2, loadFactor).calculate();
57 }
58 
59 double MotorCurrent::calculateOptimalCurrent() {
60  EstimateFLA estimateFLA(motorRatedPower, motorRPM, lineFrequency, efficiencyClass,specifiedEfficiency, ratedVoltage);
61  const std::array<double, 6> plValues = estimateFLA.calculate();
62 
63 // Adjustment based on the measured Voltage/ Field Voltage
64 // double temp_fullLoadAmps = plValues[4];
65 // for (int i = 0; i < 6; i++) {
66 // plValues[i] = plValues[i]*((((fieldVoltage/ratedVoltage)-1)*(1+(-2*(0.25*i))))+1);
67 // }
68  if (loadFactor < 0.251) {
69  CurveFitVal cfv({0, .25, .50}, {plValues[0], plValues[1], plValues[2]}, 2, loadFactor);
70  return cfv.calculate();
71  } else if (loadFactor < 1.251) {
72  CurveFitVal cfv({.25, .50, .75, 1.00, 1.25}, {plValues[1], plValues[2], plValues[3], plValues[4], plValues[5]}, 4, loadFactor);
73  return cfv.calculate();
74  }
75  if (loadFactor > 1.5) {
76  loadFactor = 1.5;
77  }
78  return CurveFitVal({.75, 1.00, 1.25}, {plValues[3], plValues[4], plValues[5]}, 2, loadFactor).calculate();
79 }
